BASE.name: Q.E.D.
text: Effect changes based on number of turns passed.

data.title: The effect of Q.E.D. is determined by the value produced by the modulo operation (turns passed) mod 4. In other words, divide the number of turns passed by 4 and use the remainder. This means the value produced will always be 1, 2, 3, or 0:
text: • In quests with multiple battles, if a battle ends without pressing Attack, the number of turns does not progress.
• Effects become stronger as more turns pass, capping at 17+ turns (or 5 loops). All results affect all allies and buffs last for 3 turns.

data.title: Remainder: 1
text: • **Effect**: <:Status_AttackUp:832581064555364362> **ATK Up**, <:Status_Defiance:832588448593346600> **C.A. DMG Up**, <:Status_Defiance:832588448593346600> **C.B. DMG Up**

BASE.name: Debate
text: Change damage based on the last digit of main allies' total HP.

data.title: ​
text: • Damage is based on the sum of all four allies' current HP.
• The last digit of the current HP sum determines the power.
• 7 always deals 1000% Plain Damage while all other numbers deal 100%-500% Water damage.
- 0 deals the least damage.
- 5 deals the most damage.
- 7 has a damage cap of 77,777.

BASE.name: Half-God Half-Demon
text:
Activate Half-God Half-Demon mode.
Gain Dark element qualities and reduce Light damage taken by 25%.
Normal attacks and charge attacks deal bonus Dark damage.
(Uses 100% of charge bar).

data.title: ​
text: • None of the buffs and effects of Half-God Half-Demon mode are visible status buffs.
• Using Half-God Half-Demon when Amira is already transformed will have no effect and its cooldown will be set to 1 turn.

• The Bonus Dark Damage from Amira's transformation doesn't reduce the normal Damage by 50% like other Bonus Damage buffs but reduces the elemental modifier from 100% to 50%. Accordingly, it is not affected by any Light elemental modifier increases, such as Lucifer or <:Status_LightAtkUp:832596750144503828> Light ATK Up, but will benefit from Dark elemental modifier increases, such as Bahamut or <:Status_DarkAtkUp:832588129894006794> Dark ATK Up. This allows her to scale stronger with Dark elemental buffs compared to others.
